caption: Scheduled Job Activity
description: Scheduled Job Activity events report activities related to scheduled jobs or tasks.
name: scheduled_job_activity

activity.description: The normalized caption of 'activity_id' or the source specific value.

actor.description: The actor that performed the activity on the job object.

category_uid.description: The category unique identifier of the event.

class_uid.description: The unique identifier of a class. A class describes the attributes available in an event.

1006.caption: Scheduled Job Activity
1006.description: Scheduled Job Activity events report activities related to scheduled jobs or tasks.

device.description: The device that is the target of the activity.

start_time.description: The start time of a time period, or the time of the least recent event included in the aggregate event.

type_uid.description: The resulting job object when the activity was allowed and successful.

100600.caption: Unknown
100600.description: The activity type "Scheduled Job Activity: Unknown" is not further specified.

100601.caption: Create
100601.description: A request to create a new job.

100602.caption: Update
100602.description: A request to update an existing job.

100603.caption: Delete
100603.description: A request to delete an existing job.

100604.caption: Enable
100604.description: A request to enable an existing job.

100605.caption: Disable
100605.description: A request to disable an existing job.

100606.caption: Start
100606.description: A request to start an existing job.

100699.caption: Other
100699.description: The activity type "Scheduled Job Activity: Other" is not further specified.
